doc:
Steve Howey (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Howey_(actor) 0 Steven Michael Robert Howey (born July 12, 1977 in San Antonio, Texas) is an American film and television actor. He is known for his roles as Van Montgomery on The WB/CW television series Reba, and Kevin Ball on the Showtime series Shameless. Howey has also appeared in the films Supercross, DOA: Dead or Alive, Bride Wars, Game Over, Man!, and Something Borrowed. Steven_Michael_Robert_Howey ( born July_12_,_1977 in San_Antonio , Texas ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor .
